transcript: Alex is ridiculous about hangers like he has to have the smooth hangers he cannot have the felt hangers and you have the felt hangers he's like this is absurd like I cannot believe the cleaners put the felt hangers on my side because it's impossible to pull clothes off of them I stretch all the shirts if I'm trying to like pull them off they like won't come off and they'll put them the wrong way so I'll have hooks that are in different directions and they'll be velvet and smooth and it's just chaos
